about.name: Jaswanth Sai
about.title: Full Stack Developer
about.subTitle: I develop web applications
about.description: As a Full Stack Developer with 2+ years of experience, I have honed my skills in React, .Net and am currently learning next js to expand my expertise. I pride myself on being a quick learner and attentive listener, which allows me to collaborate effectively with clients to create efficient and scalable solutions. My focus is on developing user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems.
about.quote: Live the Life as you want

timeline.summary: Contributed to multiple client-specific implementations of the Digital Edge Billing product, providing tailored solutions to meet diverse business needs across different industries.
bulletPoints: Delivered tailored client implementations of the Digital Edge Billing platform for the insurance and finance sectors, aligning features with evolving business requirements.
Built modular, reusable UI components using React.js, accelerating delivery and reducing effort across multiple projects.
Designed and integrated secure RESTful APIs with ASP.NET Core, ensuring smooth and scalable data exchange between frontend and backend systems.
Optimized SQL Server performance by refining stored procedures and query logic, improving responsiveness and system efficiency.
Implemented JWT-based authentication to safeguard APIs and enforce client-specific access controls.
Integrated Azure Application Insights for real-time telemetry, diagnostics, and performance tracking in production environments.
Built supporting tools for automated document generation, dynamic email delivery, and secure SFTP/FTP pipelines, reducing manual processes and improving system reliability.

projects.title: QueryAI â€“ AI-Powered SQL Query and Data Visualization
projects.description: AI-driven data platform that translates natural language into SQL queries and visualizes structured data interactively, with a secure, scalable full-stack architecture.
highlights: Developed a complex AI-driven platform where users can interact with structured data using natural language.
Integrated Gemini API for intelligent SQL query generation from user prompts.
Designed a responsive dashboard UI with React + TailwindCSS.
Built a real-time chat interface for AI-driven query generation.
Implemented interactive data grid with pagination, sorting, and backend filtering.
Visualized dynamic data using Recharts (bar, line, pie).
Secured backend with .NET Core APIs and JWT-based authentication.
Added caching and query optimization for faster performance.
Deployed full stack with CORS, HTTPS, and CI/CD (Vercel + Render).

testimonials.name: Samantha Wu
testimonials.review: I had the pleasure of working closely with John on a challenging project. He is a highly skilled developer who consistently delivered excellent results. His ability to understand complex requirements and implement efficient solutions was truly impressive. I would highly recommend him to any organization looking for a talented developer.

testimonials.name: David Rodriguez
testimonials.review: Throughout our project, John demonstrated exceptional technical skills and a strong work ethic. He consistently met deadlines and produced high-quality code that exceeded our expectations. His proactive approach to problem-solving and effective communication made him a valuable member of our team

testimonials.name: Emily Chen
testimonials.review: I had the pleasure of collaborating with John on a complex web application project. His ability to translate design concepts into functional, user-friendly features was impressive. John consistently delivered high-quality work and was always open to feedback. I look forward to working with him again in the future.

testimonials.name: Michael Lee
testimonials.review: John is a skilled developer with a keen eye for detail. He played a crucial role in our team, consistently producing clean, efficient code. His collaborative nature and willingness to take on new challenges make him an invaluable asset to any project."

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.review: Working with John was an absolute delight. Their professionalism and technical prowess were evident from day one. He consistently delivered top-notch code and went above and beyond to ensure the success of our project. I highly recommend him for any development endeavor
